# Introduction

`scalarAddition` adds two integers on host and accelerator, and also compares
the performance.

# Build

```bash
autoreconf -i; ./configure; make; make check; sudo make install;
```

`make check` has been tested on OCuLUS (with OpenCCS) and P53s (without OpenCCS).

# Documentation

* docs/html/index.html: Source code documentation generated by Doxygen.

* docs/UserManual.md: User Manual.
